comment: Very amazing, Professor Draper is truly amazing I learned a lot from his Character Development class. I am already entering my final year for this college. Gave me a lot of knowledge about the field of work I plan in getting into.

AMAZING professor with tons of industry knowledge, and his Studio 1 class taught me more about Harmony than any animation class I've taken. He is super understanding and will work with you to make sure your projects are great. Make sure to stay on top of things and you will get a lot from the course.

He's an amazing professor! Show up to class and work throughout class and you wont have any issues getting an A. Listen to his constructive feedback during class and use it to fix any mistakes you have before grading. He's very understanding, but don't take that for granted.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: He gives great feedback and takes the time to check up on how everyone is doing. Very approachable, and you can tell he cares about and enjoys what he's doing. Grading is fair and there are plenty of opportunities for help along the way if you ask. He can also be unexpectedly funny! Would love to have his class again.

One of the best professors I've ever had!
- grades somewhat easy, but gives great feedback
- genuinely cares about your success, as long as you show effort
- caring and funny
- 30+ years in the industry, really knows what he's talking about. great connection to have and person to know
